original_text: Now is the time to cut down the fruits. They are ready for you to bring them in. Walk all over the grapes. The winepress is full of them. They come over the top. The people in all countries have done so many bad things.’ Now is the time to cut down the fruits.
korean_text: 너희는 낫을 쓰라 곡식이 익었도다 와서 밟을지어다 포도주 틀이 가득히 차고 포도주 독이 넘치니 그들의 악이 큼이로다

sentences.original_text: Now is the time to cut down the fruits.
They are ready for you to bring them in.
The winepress is full of them.
The people in all countries have done so many bad things.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 나라의 사람들이 너무 많은 악한 일들을 행했다.

sentences.original_text: Now is the time to cut down the fruits.
